original_text: And the captain of the guard charged Joseph with them, and he served them: and they continued a season in ward.
korean_text: 친위대장이 요셉에게 그들을 수종들게 하매 요셉이 그들을 섬겼더라 그들이 갇힌 지 여러 날이라

sentences.original_text: And the captain of the guard charged Joseph with them
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 시위대 장관이 요셉에게 그들을 맡겼고

sentences.original_text: and they continued a season in ward
